rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a North-facing opening that aligns with Vastu principles for welcoming positive energy. The area is designed to have ample natural light and a transitional space connecting outdoors and indoors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living room adjacent to the central courtyard, maximizing natural light and ventilation. Incorporates Mediterranean design elements like stone finishes and wooden accents.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A semi-open dining area connected to the kitchen, allowing for an integrated flow with the living spaces while maintaining distinct functions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, functional kitchen designed to support Mediterranean culinary traditions. Features natural ventilation through strategically placed windows near the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed for relaxation and comfort. The room is oriented for optimum light from indirect sources, ensuring privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: An outdoor space adjacent to living areas, offering a Mediterranean feel with decorative tiles and plant arrangements. Serves as a transition between indoor and the central courtyard.

openings.notes: Aligns with Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Designed to welcome natural light.
Strategically placed for maximum natural ventilation and illumination, including in the living room and kitchen areas adjacent to the courtyard.
Provides connection between indoor spaces and the central courtyard, enhancing air circulation and light penetration.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom designed with a large balcony offering views of the rooftop terrace. The layout follows Mediterranean aesthetics with warm color palettes, ensuring privacy and natural light while conforming to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Three additional bedrooms, each with its own window for sufficient ventilation and sunlight exposure as per Vastu guidelines. Their sizes are optimized for comfort within the overall area allocation.

rooms.name: Bathroom(s)
rooms.description: Bathrooms are integrated into each bedroom layout to provide convenience while maintaining privacy and natural light indirectly through ventilation openings.

openings.notes: Provides access to the rooftop terrace and ensures ample daylight, aligning with Mediterranean design.
Strategically placed for optimal ventilation and natural light in accordance with local building norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious terrace offering panoramic views and outdoor living. Designed to serve as a relaxation area, equipped with seating, greenery, and Mediterranean-style decorative elements.

rooms.name: Service Areas
rooms.description: Includes storage, utility spaces, or additional small rooms that complement the overall design while remaining unobtrusive.

openings.location: From first floor to second floor
openings.notes: Provides safe and efficient access to the rooftop terrace.
Allows for natural airflow, ensuring a comfortable environment during warm weather.
